message.content:
Sure! Here is a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes from characters in "Game of Thrones" and "House of the Dragon," formatted as an array of JSON objects:

```json
[
    {"message": "When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives.", "author": "Ned Stark"},
    {"message": "A mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone.", "author": "Tyrion Lannister"},
    {"message": "Chaos isn’t a pit. Chaos is a ladder.", "author": "Petyr Baelish"},
    {"message": "The things I do for love.", "author": "Jaime Lannister"},
    {"message": "The greatest war is not against your enemies, but within yourself.", "author": "Bran Stark"},
    {"message": "Fire and Blood.", "author": "House Targaryen"},
    {"message": "A lion does not concern himself with the opinion of sheep.", "author": "Tywin Lannister"},
    {"message": "Winter is Coming.", "author": "Ned Stark"},
    {"message": "The past is a ghost. The future is a dream. All we ever have is now.", "author": "Brynden Tully"},
    {"message": "I drink and I know things.", "author": "Tyrion Lannister"},
    {"message": "There is only one war that matters. The Great War. And it is here.", "author": "Jon Snow"},
    {"message": "You win or you die. There is no middle ground.", "author": "Cersei Lannister"},
    {"message": "Every man must die, but not every man truly lives.", "author": "Robb Stark"},
    {"message": "What is dead may never die.", "author": "The Ironborn"},
    {"message": "Knowledge is power.", "author": "Petyr Baelish"},
    {"message": "To be a dragon, you must have fire in your blood.", "author": "Daenerys Targaryen"},
    {"message": "We are all human. We all bleed.", "author": "Sansa Stark"},
    {"message": "Fear cuts deeper than swords.", "author": "Arya Stark"},
    {"message": "The night is dark and full of terrors.", "author": "Melisandre"},
    {"message": "Your bliss is in your truth. Find it.", "author": "Syrio Forel"},
    {"message": "You know nothing, Jon Snow.", "author": "Ygritte"},
    {"message": "Power resides where men believe it resides.", "author": "Varys"},
    {"message": "You serve the realm, you serve the king, you serve your family.", "author": "Olenna Tyrell"},
    {"message": "Dragons are not a lazy creature.", "author": "Daemon Targaryen"},
    {"message": "Love is the death of duty.", "author": "Jon Snow"},
    {"message": "Everybody dies sooner or later. Make your death mean something.", "author": "Barristan Selmy"},
    {"message": "There is no justice in the world. Only power.", "author": "Cersei Lannister"},
    {"message": "Sometimes, the best way to get to the heart of a man is to take a knife to it.", "author": "Euron Greyjoy"},
    {"message": "You cannot stop the change any more than you can stop the suns from setting.", "author": "Rhaenyra Targaryen"},
    {"message": "A girl has no name.", "author": "Arya Stark"},
    {"message": "The only way to win is to do it together.", "author": "Daenerys Targaryen"},
    {"message": "Live by the sword, die by the sword.", "author": "Tyrion Lannister"},
    {"message": "The truth is rarely pure and never simple.", "author": "Varys"},
    {"message": "A man with no motive is a man with no end.", "author": "Littlefinger"},
    {"message": "The past is a lesson. The future a battle.", "author": "Viserys Targaryen"},
    {"message": "Faith is not supposed to be a comfort. It’s supposed to be a challenge.", "author": "Davos Seaworth"},
    {"message": "Beneath the armor, there is a man. Respect the man.", "author": "Brienne of Tarth"},
    {"message": "Only the mad survive.", "author": "Rhaegar Targaryen"},
    {"message": "Minds are like swords; the more they are sharpened, the greater the power.", "author": "Tyrion Lannister"},
    {"message": "Hold the door!", "author": "Hodor"},
    {"message": "A good king knows when to listen.", "author": "Robb Stark"},
    {"message": "Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.", "author": "Julius Caesar (quoted by Tyrion Lannister)"},
    {"message": "Dare to be different. Embrace your inner dragon.", "author": "House Targaryen"},
    {"message": "We do not sow.", "author": "House Greyjoy"},
    {"message": "A fight is not won by the strongest. It is won by the smartest.", "author": "Petyr Baelish"},
    {"message": "What matters is what you can prove.", "author": "Olenna Tyrell"},
    {"message": "Love is poison. A sweet poison, yes, but it will kill you all the same.", "author": "Cersei Lannister"},
    {"message": "Sometimes you need to do the things you hate.", "author": "Jaime Lannister"},
    {"message": "With great power comes great responsibility.", "author": "Yoda (not from the universe, but for inspiration)"}
]
```

Feel free to adjust or replace any quotes as needed!
